name: Fighter Fleet
description:
Lead your fleet to safety! Dodge the extraterrestrial threats and rescue fellow pilots as you race endlessly through enemy territory. Collect powerful upgrades, and blast those alien scum back to their home planet! 

Current Build: Alpha - Working on updates!

~~~~~~~~ CONTROLS ~~~~~~~~

Move Left - Press left side of screen or Left Arrow Key

Move Right - Press left side of screen or Left Arrow Key

Fire Missile - Press bottom part of screen or Space Bar

alpha-v0.1

Running on Windows:

Just extract the ffwindows.zip and make sure the .pck file is in the same directory as the fighter_fleet.exe

Running on Android:

Just download the .apk and install. Your phone may ask to allow install from other sources, allow it and it should install no problem! Will be available for the Play Store soon.

If any issues installing or running, let me know and I will do my best to fix them, thanks!
